titleInfo.title: Interaction of electric fields with membrane-bound polyionic proteins

Molecular electro-optics: electro-optic properties of macromolecules and colloids in solution ; [proceedings of a NATO Advanced Study Inst. on Molecular Electro-optics, held July 14 - 24, 1980, at Rensselaer Polytechn. Inst., Troy, NY]
